segments.text: Good morning , may I speak with Professor Clark , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are speaking with Professor Clark .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Professor , I am Kalina from your morning literature class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , how can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ran my car into a tree yesterday and need to miss a few days of school .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , my God ! I hope you are all right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a concussion , but I will be OK .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much school will you miss ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I only need to take this week off .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I appreciate you calling and telling me that you won â€™ t be in class . See you next week !
segments.speaker: S2
